firstTimeAgreement.agreement_checkbox: I agree to the terms and conditions
firstTimeAgreement.agreement_warning_msg: You are required to agree with the agreement before continue on

fleetGuruAssistant.content_step_1: I’m Loka, your personal assistant! In a few moments I’ll show you how to use Lokomotive and be a Star Fleet Manager!
fleetGuruAssistant.content_step_2: Here you’ll find most of the tools that will help you with your daily tasks. For infographics and charts click on the Dashboard icon.
fleetGuruAssistant.content_step_3: You can find the settings button at the bottom of the sidebar. If you want to turn the system sounds on/off, you can change it here.
fleetGuruAssistant.content_step_4: Starting from the right, you can find your profile page. There, you can change your profile picture, update your password, and log out of Lokomotive. To the left of that is the notifications center. To the left of that is the feedback portal. Lastly, to the left of that is the global search bar, where you can search for any asset.
fleetGuruAssistant.content_step_5: If you ever have any questions about navigating Lokomotive, I’ll always be available here at your service! You can search anything about your fleet, access knowledge base, and get regular tips from me :)

fleetGuru.greeting_msg: Hey I’m FleetGuru! Your personal assistant :)
fleetGuru.searchbar_placeholder: What would you like to know?
fleetGuru.detail_maintenance: Being proactive by adhering to a Preventative Maintenance Schedule can reduce repair costs by up to 25%. What’s limiting you to keeping your Preventative Maintenance on track? Scheduling, vendor, asset usage? We can help.
fleetGuru.title_asset_request: What are the best practices when purchasing an asset?
fleetGuru.detail_asset_request: By knowing your optimum replacement cycle you can greatly decrease your purchase costs through factory ordering. Although a major cost, the purchase of a new asset is only approximately 10% of the total cost of ownership. Factory ordering insures you are purchasing an asset that is fit for purpose, with no added costs through options that may not be required. Manufacturers likely offer rebates and concessions. Have you discussed with them how to qualify?
fleetGuru.title_incident: How do you classify your incidents?
fleetGuru.detail_incident: Knowing whether incident are preventable opens opportunities to training, lower insurance rates and reduced liability
fleetGuru.title_asset_removal: Are unused assets costing you money?
fleetGuru.detail_asset_removal: Having an asset “grave yard” is leaving money on the table. Assets no longer in use, are absorbing valuable storage. The world is focusing on environmental responsibility. By disposing of your unusable inventory in a conscientious method you are doing your part.
fleetGuru.title_issues: Do you track issues with your assets?
fleetGuru.detail_issues: Things happen, but tracking the number of resolved and unresolved issues can help you better manage your asset utilization and minimize downtimes.
fleetGuru.title_fuel_orders: Are you getting the best deals on your fuel?
fleetGuru.detail_fuel_orders: Fuel providers offer volume discounts. Do you qualify? Are you eligible for more?
fleetGuru.title_operators: Have you digitize your daily reports?
fleetGuru.detail_operators: Are you tired of countless paper reports? Conveniently complete and submit your daily checks digitally through the system.
fleetGuru.title_fleet_at_a_glance: What KPIs do you use to manage your fleet?
fleetGuru.detail_fleet_at_a_glance: By documenting everything digitally you can continuously monitor KPI’s.
fleetGuru.title_asset_transfer: How can asset relocation meet your fleet demands?
fleetGuru.detail_asset_transfer: Managing the utilization of your inventory will provide opportunities to possibly relocate or repurpose an existing asset rather than purchase a new one.
fleetGuru.title_repairs: What you should know about repairing your fleet?
fleetGuru.detail_repairs: Are you paying for something you shouldn’t? Make sure you check your warranty first. Not only the manufacturers warranty on newer assets. If it is a reoccurring problem, vendors usually carry a small warranty period on their work. Every asset has a usable life cycle before the repairs are exceeding their value. Do you have a defined measurement (mileage, hours, time in service?) to identify when it makes more sense to replace an asset? Are you seeing long delays in getting assets back into service? Do you know the cause?
fleetGuru.detail_fuel_tracking: Can you see if some areas are using more fuel? Do you know why? Older assets can use more fuel for several reasons. A repair is necessary or asset is working too hard (no longer fit for purchase) plus new models are more efficient. Tracking fuel costs can identify anomalies or fraud.

Where they are not possible, marking a drawing on the form would work.

lookupDailyCheckPanelIndex.tooltip_forks: Forks not bent or at different heights; no cracks present; positioning latches in good working condition; carriage teeth not broken, chipped or worn

totalVehicleDowntimeChartCard.description: Measures total time the vehicle is out of service due to breakdowns or maintenance activities within a given period. Evaluates vehicle’s availability & efficiency to optimize maintenance processes & minimize disruptions.
